name: shamelessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a lack of shame, especially about something generally considered unacceptable: I am disgusted at the thoughtlessness and shamelessness displayed by these players. He performed his duties with cunning, shamelessness, and violence.
behaviour that is intended to attract sexual interest, and that shows no feeling of shame: He blushed at her shamelessness. See
shameless
More examplesFewer examplesNobody would have the shamelessness to do such a terrible thing.Her absolute shamelessness means she can get away with things others simply can't.The jury were astounded at the shamelessness of his views about adultery. Promiscuity, shamelessness, and corruption ruled supreme.With her customary shamelessness, she shakes her curls and puffs out her thin lips.
